title: Verify beta homepage loads and logo
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_expected:
Then user can view the logo and it says "Opening Day 2020 Pick Em"
Predict the winner of every Opening Day game (March 26) and you could win $250,000!![](index.php?/attachments/get/25604)

title: Verify as user picks are made, the sticky nav at the header is updated
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_expected: Then the sticky nav on the header updates as picks are being made to say Selected Picks 1/15, 2/15 etc

title: Verify only one selection per game card can be made
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps: When user attempts to pick more than one per card
custom_expected: Then user can verify that they can make only one selection per card

title: Verify making a selection highlights the card with a blue checkmark and blue outlining
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_expected: Then the card is highlighted in blue outline and a blue checkmark

title: Verify Ads display without errors
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_expected: Then User can verify ads display without any errors

title: Verify there are 15 game cards displayed
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_expected: Then user can verify that there are 15 sets of cards displayed

title: Verify team name, team logo, probable pitcher section within card, and time stamp for game displays
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_expected:
Then user can verify the following sections show within each game card:
-Team Name
-Team Logo
-Probable Pitcher (will say TBD for most)
-Time stamp will show above the two gamecards

title: Verify you cannot submit without making selections without selecting all 15
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps: Then When user attempts to submit without having made a selection for all 15 sections
custom_expected: User is unable to submit as submit button doesnt show

title: Verify after making 15 selections, you are taken to a form to fill out your information
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps: When user has filled out selections for all 15 cards
custom_expected: Then user is a shown a form with information to be filled out

title: Verify all the fields are required and user cannot submit leaving any blank
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps:
When user has filled out selections for all 15 cards
AND user has filled out some of the information on form but not all
custom_expected:
Then user can verify that all fields are required AND
User cannot submit leaving any field blank

title: Verify user can fill out all fields and click blue submit button
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps: When user has made all their selections
custom_expected: Then user sees a submit button and can click it

title: Verify for total home runs and total runs scored, you can only enter numeric input
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps: When user has made all their selections
custom_expected: Then user can verify that these two fields only allow numeric values

title: Verify after submitting, you are shown a Thanks for submitting! Review your picks below and the page shows your picks
custom_preconds: Given user is on pick em hompeage
custom_steps: When user has made all their selections AND user has filled out the form and submitted
custom_expected: Then user is showing "thanks for submitting! Review your pick below" message which shows users picks

title: Verify user receives a confirmation email (the picks wont be shown in confirmation email - this is a known issue)
custom_preconds: Given user has submitted their picks
custom_expected: Then user should get a confirmation email of their submission (email wont show picks yet - known issue)
